Class Cinema

  • Object
    • Cinema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PlatinumCinema

    public class Cinema
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents a cinema that exist in a cineplex A cinema can only exist in a cineplex A cinema is composed of many seats
    Since:
    2019-11-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    SS3_Group4
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
